title: Request for Body-worn Camera Footage: Richard Ring (March 29, 2023)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arizona Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

All unedited body-worn camera / bodycam recordings related to the following law enforcement critical incident: 

Incident Date: March 29, 2023  
Location: 2100 block of N. Central, Chandler, AZ  
Victim Name: Richard Ring  

I am specifically requesting the unedited body-worn camera recordings captured by all officers present for the full duration of the incident, including audio recordings associated with the footage.  

If any portion of the requested footage must be redacted, I ask that you clearly indicate the portions that have been redacted and provide an explanation of the legal basis for the redactions. If the requested footage is withheld in its entirety, please provide a detailed explanation citing relevant public records exemption(s).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Jeffrey Lamson
